title: Pixel 3XL No longer makes or receives phone calls on T-Mobile after Android 10 Update
content:
I am trying to receive or make calls from my Pixel 3 XL now that I upgraded to Android 10 and it no longer works.  The signal indicator switches from LTE to H+ during the attempt, but ultimately switches back to LTE with no phone call placed or received.  I dont understand how Google can release an update that takes away the core functionality of a phone away from my phone.  Speed test looks good for data (40Mbps ovs LTE up and down) so it's not a connectivity issue but rather It's a phone call issue.  Oddly, Skype and Google Voice are also unable to make calls.  Booting into safe mode I have no cell signal but if I connect to WiFi, then WiFi calling works fine.

Update 6:00pm:
Clearing the cache and user data did nothing at first.  Then I uninstalled all updates and went to the factory default version of the phone app and then cleared user data and cache again.  Now calling is working again.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
